TITLE: Episode 51 - That Sh*t's for Losers with Eric July
DESCRIPTION: This week, I am joined by Maddie from the Voluntary Vixens and a giant in the liberty world, Eric July. We talk about his band, Backwordz, and their new song, "The Great Equalizer," Blackout Tuesday, the creativity in the liberty world, and how he would fight Tom Morello in a communist v. capitalist cage match.
